events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin processing shortly.
The application has been categorized under engineering roles based on the candidate's resume and skills in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering placements has been assigned to manage this candidate's process and coordinate next steps.
The candidate completed an initial screening interview where their experience with software engineering fundamentals was discussed.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the role and availability for further technical evaluations.
The technical interview for assessing coding skills and software design knowledge was scheduled with the candidate for May 6th.
